japanese:
（部屋が広い。
　落ち着かないほどに広い）
translation:
(This room is really spacious.
 It's so big that it's unsettling.)

japanese:
（ホテルって泊まるためだけの施設だろ？
　こんなに部屋を広くする必要あるのか？）
translation:
(A hotel is just a place to stay, right?
 Is it necessary to make the room this big?)

japanese:
（俺１人ならもっと狭い部屋でもいいのに。
　なにして過ごしてりゃいいんだ？　やっぱ勉強か？）
translation:
(If it was just me, I'd be fine with a smaller room.
 What am I supposed to do to pass the time?
 Study, I guess?)

japanese: （ん？　誰だ？）
translation: (Hm? Who is it?)

japanese: はい。
translation: Yes?

japanese: やっほー、来ちゃった。
translation: Hey, it's me.

japanese:
い、一花！？
なにしに来たんだよ！
translation:
I-Ichika?!
What are you coming here for?

japanese:
私がフータロー君の部屋に来るのに理由がいる？
付き合ってるのに。
translation:
Do I need a reason to come to your room,
Futaro-kun?
We're dating, after all.

japanese:
……そ、それもそうか。
そうだな……。
translation:
Uh, I guess you're right.
Well then...

japanese:
ふふ、なにを照れてるのかな？
彼氏さん。
translation: Teehee, are you blushing, honey?

japanese:
やめろよ、そういうの。
反応に困るんだって。
translation:
Cut it out, that kinda stuff.
It makes me uncomfortable.

japanese:
いやぁ、いい反応だよ。
何度も見たくなっちゃうもん。
translation:
Nah, that was a good reaction.
I just wanna see it over and over again.

japanese:
も、もういい！
それより早く入れ！
translation:
E-enough!
Hurry up and come on in!

japanese: はーい、お邪魔しまーす。
translation: Okay, thanks for having me.

japanese:
まあ、適当にくつろいでくれ。
そっちのベットは使わないし、
椅子代わりにしてくれていいぞ。
translation:
Well, just make yourself comfortable.
I'm not using that bed over there,
so you can use it as a chair or something.

japanese:
ありがと。
じゃあ遠慮なく。
translation:
Thanks.
Then I will.

japanese:
くつろいでくれって言ってるフータロー君は、
全然くつろげてるように見えないねー。
translation:
Even though you to told me to relax,
you don't seem very relaxed yourself,
do you, Futaro-kun?

japanese:
この部屋は俺１人じゃ広すぎるんだよ。
正直、なにをしてりゃいいのかわからん。
translation:
This room is too spacious for just me.
Honestly, I don't know what to do with all this space.

japanese:
あー、さては勉強でもしようなんて
考えたんじゃない？
translation:
Oh, I see.
You're thinking of studying or something, aren't you?

japanese:
あははっ！
君はどんな時でもブレないなぁ。
translation:
Ahaha!
You never waver, no matter what.

japanese:
って、まさかとは思うけど、
本当に勉強道具持ってきてる？
translation:
But, I didn't really think
you'd bring any study materials with you.
Did you really?

japanese: さすがに、ちょっとしか持ってきてねぇよ。
translation: Well, I only brought a little bit with me.

japanese: ちょっとでも持ってきてるんだ！？
translation: You DID, even if just a little?!

japanese:
ダメだよ、勉強はなし！
これはご褒美の卒業旅行なんだから！
translation:
No way, no studying allowed!
This is a graduation trip!

japanese:
暇な時は、こうして
いつでも私が相手してあげるから。
translation:
When you're bored,
I'll always be here to keep you company.

japanese: ほら、隣座って。
translation: Come on, sit next to me.

japanese: ……おう。
translation: Okay.

japanese: じゃあ、その……なにしよっか？
translation: So, um... What should we do?

japanese: な……なにって……。
translation: Wh-what do you mean, what...?

japanese:
う、ううん！
やっぱり、いまのなしでっ！
君はなにも聞かなかった！
translation:
N-nothing! Forget it!
You didn't hear anything!

japanese: あ、ああ。
translation: O-okay.

japanese: あははー……。
translation: Ahaha...

japanese:
（……部屋に一花と２人きり、
　しかも隣り合って座っている。
　これは絶好のチャンスなんじゃないか？）
translation:
(We're alone in the room, sitting next to each other.
 This could be a great chance, right?)

japanese:
（いやいや！
　初日の夜からいきなりって、
　さすがにがっつきすぎだろ俺！）
translation:
(No, no!
 It's too early to do something like that
 on the first night. I'll seem too pushy!)

japanese:
（ここで失敗して気まずいことになったら
　残りの期間、どう過ごすんだよ！）
translation:
(If I mess up now and make things awkward,
 how will I spend the rest of the trip?!)

japanese:
（もっと最適なタイミングがあるはず。
　急いては事を仕損じる、だ。
　会話で繋いで様子を伺おう）
translation:
(There must be a better time for this.
 Haste makes waste.
 Let's continue talking and see how it goes.)

japanese:
そ、そういえば……
ここに来る時、二乃になんか
言われたりしなかったか？
translation:
B-by the way...
did Nino say anything to you
when we were on our way here?

japanese: どうして？
translation: Why do you ask?

japanese:
いや、その、俺たちが……付き合っているのは
周知の事実とはいえ、やっぱり少しは
引っかかることがあったりするんじゃないか？
translation:
Well, I mean... Even though everybody knows
that we're together, it still might bother her
a little, don't you think?

japanese:
心配性だね、フータロー君は。
別に平気だったよ？
translation:
You worry too much, Futaro-kun.
It's fine, really.

japanese:
みんなが私たちのお付き合いを応援してくれてるのは、
君もよくわかってるんじゃない？
translation:
You understand well
that everyone supports us dating,
don't you?

japanese: それは、もちろんだ。
translation: Of course.

japanese: だよね。
translation: I thought so.

japanese:
君と付き合い始めた頃は色々あったけどさ、
そこを乗り越えたからこそ
いまがあるんだから。
translation:
When we first started dating,
we went through a lot of things,
but that's why we're here now, because we overcame them.

japanese: ……ああ。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
というわけで、この話はここまで！
それよりね、ちょっと聞きたいことがあるんだ。
translation:
So, enough about that!
Actually, there's something I want to ask you.

japanese: なんだ？
translation: What is it?

japanese: えっと、その～……。
translation: Well, um...

japanese:
ふ、フータロー君、
明日が楽しみすぎて眠れなくなってたり
しないかな～って。
translation:
I-I was wondering if,
you're so excited about tomorrow
that you can't sleep.

japanese:
そこはさすがに問題なさそうだ。
今日は移動だけだったとはいえ、
なんだかんだで疲れてるし。
translation:
That won't be a problem.
Today was just the trip here,
but I'm a bit tired from everything.

japanese: あはは、だよねー。
translation: Ahaha, I gotcha.

japanese:
一花こそ寝坊すんなよ？
起きれずに二乃に蹴飛ばされても知らんぞ。
translation:
Don't oversleep, Ichika.
Even if you get kicked by Nino for oversleeping,
I won't take responsibility.

japanese: さすがに、そこまでねぼすけじゃないよ。
translation: I'm not that much of a sleepyhead.

japanese:
それに、せっかくのフータロー君との旅行なんだもん。
寝過ごしたりなんてもったいない。
translation:
Also, it's our trip with you, Futaro-kun.
It would be a waste to oversleep or miss anything.

japanese:
……ああ。
楽しんでいこうぜ。
translation:
Yeah.
Let's have some fun.

japanese: だね。
translation: Yeah.

japanese:
さ、さてとっ！
フータロー君も眠そうだし、
私はそろそろ退散しようかな。
translation:
W-well then!
You look sleepy too, Futaro-kun,
so I think I'll head back now.

japanese:
え？　もうか？
聞きたいことがあるって、さっきの話なのか？
translation:
Huh? Already?
Is there something you wanted to ask me about earlier?

japanese:
うん、そうそう。
１人で寂しくて眠れませーん！
なんてあるかもなって。
translation:
Yeah, that's right.
I thought you might say something like,
'I can't sleep alone and I'm so lonely!'

japanese:
ひとりぼっちに耐えきれなくなったら、
お姉さんの部屋に来てもいいからね？
translation:
If you can't stand being alone,
you can come to my room, okay?

japanese:
そんなことしたら、それこそ二乃に
蹴飛ばされて追い出されるのがオチだろ。
translation:
If I did that, I'd probably get kicked out
by Nino, wouldn't I?

japanese:
あはは、それもそっか。
それじゃおやすみ、フータロー君。
translation:
Hahaha, that's true.
Well then, goodnight, Futaro-kun.

japanese: ああ、おやすみ。
translation: Yeah, goodnight.

japanese: あの話は……いまじゃなくてもいいよね。
translation: That conversation... We can talk about it later.
